org.gvsig.andami.ui.mdiFrame

Interface ThreadSafeDialogs

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    ApplicationManager, MainFrame
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultApplicationManager, DefaultThreadSafeDialogs, MDIFrame

    public interface ThreadSafeDialogs

    • Method Detail

      • messageDialog

        void messageDialog(String message,
                 String title,
                 int messageType)
        Create a message dialog with an ok button. If message or title start whit a "_" then try to translate. This method is thread safe to use.
        Parameters:
        message - to present in the dialog
        title - title of the dialog
        messageType - type of icon to use.
        See Also:
        JOptionPane.showMessageDialog(Component, Object, String, int)

      • messageDialog

        void messageDialog(String message,
                 String[] messageArgs,
                 String title,
                 int messageType)
        Create a message dialog with ok button. If message or title start whit a "_" then try to translate. if messageArgs not is null the message can be formated whit MessageFormat. This method is thread safe to use.
        Parameters:
        message - to present in the dialog
        messageArgs - string array of arguments used to format the message
        title - title of the dialog
        messageType - type of icon to use.
        See Also:
        JOptionPane.showMessageDialog(Component, Object, String, int)

      • confirmDialog

        int confirmDialog(String message,
                String title,
                int optionType,
                int messageType)
        Show a JOptionPane confirm dialog. if this method is invoked out of the event dispatch thread of swing, the dialog is presented in the thread of swing and the calling thread wait to close to continue.
        Parameters:
        message -
        title -
        optionType -
        messageType -
        Returns:
        See Also:
        JOptionPane.showConfirmDialog(Component, Object, String, int, int)

      • inputDialog

        String inputDialog(String message,
                 String title,
                 int messageType,
                 String initialValue)
        Show a JOptionPane input dialog. if this method is invoked out of the event dispatch thread of swing, the dialog is presented in the thread of swing and the calling thread wait to close to continue.
        Parameters:
        message -
        title -
        optionType - an integer designating the options available on the dialog: YES_NO_OPTION, YES_NO_CANCEL_OPTION, or OK_CANCEL_OPTION
        messageType - an integer designating the kind of message this is; primarily used to determine the icon from the pluggable Look and Feel: ERROR_MESSAGE, INFORMATION_MESSAGE, WARNING_MESSAGE, QUESTION_MESSAGE, or PLAIN_MESSAGE
        Returns:
        See Also:
        JOptionPane.showInputDialog(Component, Object, String, int)

      • inputDialog

                 String title)
        Show a JOptionPane input dialog. if this method is invoked out of the event dispatch thread of swing, the dialog is presented in the thread of swing and the calling thread wait to close to continue.
        Parameters:
        message -
        title -
        optionType -
        messageType -
        Returns:
        See Also:
        JOptionPane.showInputDialog(Component, Object, String, int)

      • showDialog

        void showDialog(Component contents,
              String title)
        Create a window with the contents and title specified as parameters and show as a dialog windows of gvSIG. if this method is invoked out of the event dispatch thread of swing, the dialog is presented in the thread of swing and the calling thread wait to close to continue. in this case the dialog is not presented as modal to other components of the gui.
        Parameters:
        contents -
        title -

      • createComponent

        Component createComponent(Class<? extends Component> theClass,
                        Object... parameters)
        Creates an return a new instance of the component specified This method ensure that the component is created in the event dispatch thread of swing.
        Parameters:
        theClass - of component to be created
        parameters - passed to the constructor of the component
        Returns:
        the instance of the component created

      • createComponentWithParams

        Parameters:
        theClass - of component to be created
        parameters - passed to the constructor of the component
        Returns:
        the instance of the component created

      • showChooserDialog

        File[] showChooserDialog(String title,
                       int type,
                       int selectionMode,
                       boolean multiselection,
                       File initialPath,
                       FileFilter filter,
                       boolean fileHidingEnabled)
        Creates and show a JFileChooser dialog. This method return an array whit the selected files. If multiselection is not allowed, an array with one element is returned. If the user select the cancel button, null is returned. if this method is invoked out of the event dispatch thread of swing, the dialog is presented in the thread of swing and the calling thread wait to close to continue.
        Parameters:
        title, - title of dialog
        type - of the dialog, JFileChooser.SAVE_DIALOG or JFileChooser.OPEN_DIALOG
        selectionMode - of the dialog, values are: JFileChooser.FILES_ONLY, JFileChooser.DIRECTORIES_ONLY, JFileChooser.FILES_AND_DIRECTORIES
        multiselection, - true if multiselection is allowed
        initialPath, - to show in the dialog
        filter - used to filter the files show in the dialog.
        fileHidingEnabled, - if true hidden files are show
        Returns:
        an array whit the files selecteds or null.

      • showOpenDirectoryDialog

        File[] showOpenDirectoryDialog(String title,
                             File initialPath)
        Creates and show a JFileChooser dialog for folder selection. This is an utility method that wrap a showChooserDialog call.
        Parameters:
        title, - title of dialog
        initialPath, - to show in the dialog
        Returns:
        an array whit the files selecteds or null.
        See Also:
        showChooserDialog(String, int, int, boolean, File, FileFilter, boolean)

      • showOpenFileDialog

        File[] showOpenFileDialog(String title,
                        File initialPath)
        Creates and show a JFileChooser dialog for selection a file for open. This is an utility method that wrap a showChooserDialog(String, int, int, boolean, File, FileFilter, boolean) call.
        Parameters:
        title, - title of dialog
        initialPath, - to show in the dialog
        Returns:
        an array whit the files selecteds or null.
        See Also:
        showChooserDialog(String, int, int, boolean, File, FileFilter, boolean)

      • showSaveFileDialog

        File[] showSaveFileDialog(String title,
                        File initialPath)
        Creates and show a JFileChooser dialog for selection a file for save. This is an utility method that wrap a showChooserDialog(String, int, int, boolean, File, FileFilter, boolean) call.
        Parameters:
        title, - title of dialog
        initialPath, - to show in the dialog
        Returns:
        an array whit the files selecteds or null.
        See Also:
        showChooserDialog(String, int, int, boolean, File, FileFilter, boolean)
